issue.title: [CF 326] Rewrite the suggester
issue.body:
Yep, you heard me. Rewrite it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #326 | Raw

comments.body:
Two types of SUG modules:

  • icon type-integrated ones - either fallback onto the default ("spell") or have custom methods.
  • external modules for things like tracking spells (used by the tracking condition)

BUT, there also needs to be shared modules (e.g. items). What i will probably do is just define modules independently, but inside of their respective icon types, and use them outside the icon type if needed.

Edited Oct 31, 2011
